caption.center: COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA Respondent v. PEDRO SERRANO, Petitioner.

court.center: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Eastern District.

opinion.posture: No. 552 EAL 2004, Petition for Allowance of Appeal from the Order of the Superior Court.
opinion.opinion_text: AND NOW, this 24th day of February, 2005, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby DENIED.
